description.full: This game was classified by the community with the following category scores - Violence=3/3, Sex=0/3, Mature Content=0/3. Have you got what it takes to defend the Old Spice?  Prevent the old spice from being carried away by nemesis and battle your way to fame through 16 different levels of difficulty, covering the heights of Matterhorn and the wind swept beaches of Fiji. By scoping your enemies and preventing them from leaving with the valuable Old Spice, you can save the day, while smelling good.
description.short: Have you got what it takes to defend the Old Spice?  Prevent the old spice from being carried away by nemesis and battle your way to fame through 16 different levels of difficulty, covering the heights of Matterhorn and the wind swept beaches of Fiji. By scoping your enemies and preventing them from leaving with the valuable Old Spice, you can save the day, while smelling good.
